alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 3:04AM PST until December 02 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include but are not limited to Highways 158, 14, 178, and U.S. 395.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
